subject: Music
title: SoundCloud Rap and DIY Culture
description: One-minute skill: SoundCloud Rap and DIY Culture.

hook.text: SoundCloud rappers uploaded raw, lo-fi tracks â€” and millions of fans didn't care about polish.

buildup.text: Lil Uzi Vert, XXXTentacion, and Juice WRLD built massive followings without radio play.

discovery.text: The aesthetic valued emotion and energy over technical skill and expensive production.

twist.text: Major labels scrambled to sign SoundCloud artists â€” the underground became the mainstream.

climax.text: DIY distribution proved that audiences crave authenticity more than perfection.

punchline.text: They skipped the gatekeepers. The fans were the only gate that mattered.

quiz.question: What did SoundCloud rap prioritize over technical polish?
